description: Query a list of outgoing domain transfers
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Depth of the list, may be SELF, SUBUSER or ALL
If set to 1: verbose output (more parameters)
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes
Only lists transfer for domains which match the pattern specified here, e.g. *.com
Controls if the list shows all transfers and trades, only trades, or only user transfers and trades
Parameter by which the output will be sorted.Must be one of the following:DOMAIN, DOMAINDESC, CREATEDDATE, CREATEDDATEDESC
Only search for transfer which have been initiated after the date specified here
Only search for transfer which have been initiated before the date specified here
